channel.title: Staff crowns overlapping player name [delta]
channel.description:
hi there i was just wondering if someone could help me with this i have followed this tutorial
[url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,528486.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,528486.0.html[/url]
and it does work its just when you have a crown of some sort as in a mod or an admin it does this ..
[IMG]http://i948.photobucket.com/albums/ad324/d3non/error.jpg[/img]
i will rep++ anyone who can resolve this problem,
and thank you for taking the time to read this.
